pullrequest.title: Apply gamma correction when Scene3D engine is set to ogre2

content.raw:
There's a crash if I run

`ign gui -v 4 -c ../examples/config/scene3d.config`

And if I change:

~~~
diff -r 5555ba440b0c examples/config/scene3d.config
--- a/examples/config/scene3d.config    Wed Dec 05 18:06:52 2018 -0800
+++ b/examples/config/scene3d.config    Fri Dec 07 12:54:36 2018 -0800
@@ -11,7 +11,7 @@
       <title>View 1</title>
       <property type="string" key="state">docked</property>
     </ignition-gui>
-    <engine>ogre</engine>
+    <engine>ogre2</engine>
     <scene>scene</scene>
     <ambient_light>0 0 1</ambient_light>
     <background_color>0.8 0.8 0.8</background_color>
~~~

And run the same file again, it doesn't crash, but the scene is black instead of grey. Does it look right to you?
content.html:
There's a crash if I run

ign gui -v 4 -c ../examples/config/scene3d.config

And if I change:

diff -r 5555ba440b0c examples/config/scene3d.config
--- a/examples/config/scene3d.config    Wed Dec 05 18:06:52 2018 -0800
+++ b/examples/config/scene3d.config    Fri Dec 07 12:54:36 2018 -0800
@@ -11,7 +11,7 @@
       <title>View 1</title>
       <property type="string" key="state">docked</property>
     </ignition-gui>
-    <engine>ogre</engine>
+    <engine>ogre2</engine>
     <scene>scene</scene>
     <ambient_light>0 0 1</ambient_light>
     <background_color>0.8 0.8 0.8</background_color>

And run the same file again, it doesn't crash, but the scene is black instead of grey. Does it look right to you?
